synopsis.text: Hantsu x Trash introduces us to Youhei Hamaji, an unmotivated high school freshman who struggles academically and athletically. Rejected by girls and known for his short-lived interests, Youhei's life takes an unexpected turn when a sophomore invites him to join a club promising unlimited physical contact with girls. Intrigued, he joins the Water Polo Club, but will this notorious slacker find the commitment and purpose he's been missing, or will he revert to his old ways? Dive into this ecchi sports anime and discover if Youhei can transform from a trashy player to a dedicated teammate.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
